Column.Name: Generate
Data
Date From
Date To
Financial Year
Number of Periods
Period List
Column.Formula: ARRAY_SELECT( RANGE(0, [Number of Periods]), $(i, item) IF( [Grouping Period] = "day", DATEADD("day", $item, [Date From]), [Grouping Period] = "week", DATEADD("day", 7 * $item, [Date From]), [Grouping Period] = "month", DATEADD("month", $item, [Date From]), [Grouping Period] = "quarter", DATEADD("month", 3 * $item, [Date From]), [Grouping Period] = "year", DATEADD("year", $item, [Date From]), [Grouping Period] = "alltime", [Date From] ) )

Column.Name: Earliest Year of Data
Column.Formula: GREATEST( LEAST(YEAR(LEAST(ARRAY_SELECT( [Data], $(i, item) HASH_GET($item, "Date of Issue") ))), YEAR(LEAST(ARRAY_SELECT( [Purchase Order Data], $(i, item) HASH_GET($item, "Approved Date") )))), 2015 )

Column.Name: Latest Year of Data
Column.Formula: GREATEST( YEAR(GREATEST(ARRAY_SELECT( [Data], $(i, item) HASH_GET($item, "Date of Issue") ))) + 1, YEAR(GREATEST(ARRAY_SELECT( [Purchase Order Data], $(i, item) HASH_GET($item, "Approved Date") ))) + 1, YEAR(NOW()) + 1 )

Column.Name: Report Data
Purchase Order Data
Purchase Order - Report Data
Parent Structure

Label.Text: If no vendor selected then all will be displayed

Block.HeadingText: Payment Certificates - Vendor Spend by Period
Purchase Orders - Vendor Purchase by Period

FieldEntry.Formula:
LET $result := DATE( IF( [Financial Quarter] > 2, [Financial Year] + 1, [Financial Year] ), IF( [Financial Quarter] = 0, 7, [Financial Quarter] = 1, 7, [Financial Quarter] = 2, 10, [Financial Quarter] = 3, 1, [Financial Quarter] = 4, 4 ) );
RETURN IF( OR( $result < DATE(2000), $result > DATE(3000) ), EBMS_GET_FINANCIAL_YEAR_START(DATE([Earliest Year of Data] + 1)), $result )

LET $result := DATE( IF( [Financial Quarter] = 0, [Financial Year] + 1, [Financial Quarter] >= 2, [Financial Year] + 1, [Financial Year] ), IF( [Financial Quarter] = 0, 7, [Financial Quarter] = 1, 10, [Financial Quarter] = 2, 1, [Financial Quarter] = 3, 4, [Financial Quarter] = 4, 7 ) );
RETURN IF( OR( $result < DATE(2000), $result > DATE(3000) ), DATEADD("year", 1, DATEADD("second", -1, EBMS_GET_FINANCIAL_YEAR_START(DATE([Latest Year of Data])))), DATEADD("second", -1, $result) )
